mapper.select: SELECT a.id as id, a.device_type as deviceType, a.name as name, a.media_id as mediaId, a.ckapp_id as ckappId, child_ckapp_id as childckappId, ad_item as adItem, ad_url as adUrl FROM buy_flow_activity a WHERE a.id = #{id};

mapper.update: UPDATE buy_flow_activity SET device_type = #{deviceType}, name = #{name}, media_id = #{mediaId}, ckapp_id = #{ckappId}, child_ckapp_id = #{childckappId}, ad_item = #{adItem}, ad_url = #{adUrl}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
